title: The Penn Table
description:
Description
a panel of 125 observations  from 1960  to 1985
number of observations :  3250
observation :  country
country :  World
reference: Summers, R.  and  A.  Heston (1991) “The Penn world table (mark 5): an expanded set of international comparisons, 1950-1988”, Quarterly Journal of Economics, 29, 229-256.

parameters.gdp: real GDP per capita (in 1985 US dollars)
